DOC.brief_summary: QuickOptTM optimization method provides a quicker, simpler and reliable alternative to standard echocardiography methods for optimization of sensed AV, paced AV and V-V delays in patients with CRT-P devices
DOC.brief_title: QuickOptTM Study - Using the QuickOptTM Method for Timing Cycle Optimization
